FEATURE_1_BODY: Our app contains profiles of thousands of eligible singles in the Madrid area, giving you a wide selection to choose from.
FEATURE_2_BODY: Our intelligent algorithm analyzes your preferences and finds highly compatible matches, increasing your chances of finding your ideal partner.
FEATURE_3_BODY: All user profiles on our platform are thoroughly verified to ensure authenticity and protect you from fake accounts.
FEATURE_4_BODY: Easily find potential partners near you in Madrid with our location-based search feature, making it convenient to meet up.

PLACEHOLDER_FAQ_TITLE: Frequently Asked Questions About Our Dating App
ACCORDION_ANSWER_1: Our app uses advanced algorithms to match you with compatible singles in the Madrid area based on your preferences and profile information.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_2: Is the app free to use?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_2: The basic features are free, but we offer premium subscriptions with additional benefits like unlimited swipes and advanced filtering options.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_3: How do I create a profile?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_3: Simply download the app, enter your personal details, upload some photos, and write a short bio highlighting your interests and what you're looking for in a partner.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_4: Is the app only for finding girlfriends?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_4: While the app focuses on helping guys find potential girlfriends, it is open to all genders and sexual orientations looking for meaningful connections in Madrid.
CTA_TITLE: Find Your Perfect Match in Madrid
CTA_BODY: Swipe right on love with our app designed to connect singles living in the vibrant city of Madrid. Meet compatible women for dating, relationships, or just making new friends.
CTA_SUBTITLE: Download Now and Start Your Love Story
CTA_CONTENT_SUBTITLE: Why Choose Our Madrid Dating App?
FAQ_TITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Find Your Perfect Match in Madrid
FAQ_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Get answers to common questions about our dating app
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_1: Our app uses advanced algorithms to match you with compatible singles in the Madrid area based on your preferences and interests. Simply create a profile, set your criteria, and start swiping!
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_2: Is the app only for finding relationships?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_2: Not at all! Our app is versatile - you can use it to find casual dates, new friends, or even serious relationships. It's up to you to specify what you're looking for.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_3: How do I know if someone is genuine?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_3: We have robust verification systems in place to confirm user identities and weed out fake profiles. However, we always recommend meeting matches in public first and taking standard dating precautions.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_4: Our intelligent matching goes beyond just looks - it factors in your values, life goals, sense of humor and more. Plus, we focus exclusively on singles in Madrid for more relevant local matches.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_5: Is the app free to use?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_5: Creating a basic profile is free, but we offer premium paid features like unlimited swiping, incognito mode, and advanced filtering for the best experience.
PAGE_DETAIL_1_VALUE: Our app helps you discover and meet compatible singles living in your area of Madrid. Say goodbye to endless swiping and hello to real connections!
PAGE_DETAIL_2_VALUE: We prioritize authenticity by verifying user profiles, ensuring you meet real people looking for meaningful relationships, not fake accounts or catfishes.
PAGE_DETAIL_3_VALUE: Join our community events and singles activities tailored for Madrid locals. From social mixers to outdoor adventures, connect with like-minded individuals who share your interests.
STARTER_TEMPLATE_FOOTER_CONTENT: Find your perfect match in the vibrant city of Madrid. Join thousands of singles looking for love and romance. Start your dating adventure today!

TESTIMONIAL_1_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: This app changed my life! I was so tired of the Madrid dating scene until I found my perfect match on here.
TESTIMONIAL_2_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: As a busy professional, I didn't have time to go out and meet people. This app made dating so convenient and fun!
TESTIMONIAL_3_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: I tried all the dating apps but none of them compared to this one. The matches were high-quality and compatible with me.
